roaming.roaming_back_msg: Stay connected, always with roaming plans, specially designed for you. Single destination or across the world, we have covered it all.
roaming.purchase_process: How to get my Roaming pass?
roaming.purchase_process_answer: With WANNA, subscribing to a roaming pass is super easy. Get your favourite pass in 3 simple steps: 1.Select the country of travel 2.Explore all the roaming flexible passes 3.Pay quickly with KNET, Credit cards or your WANNA balance.
roaming.how_secure: I am travelling only for a week. Recommend the best Roaming pass
roaming.how_secure_answer: You can select Password weekly pass and roam freely across all destinations. Enjoy your holiday!
roaming.how_to_apply: I wanna travel to more than one country. Get me the best suitable Roaming pass
roaming.how_to_apply_answer: Select any country where you are travelling to and go for the Daily, Weekly or Monthly Passport. Enjoy seamless Roaming experience across all your holiday destinations.
roaming.how_can_i_track: I am facing issues with my Roaming Internet. Can you help me?
roaming.how_can_i_track_answer: Weâ€™re here with you always. Reach us on WhatsApp so that our service agents can help you immediately.
